Module 1: Installation & IDEs
=============================

.. image:: ../module_1/Module 1_ Setting Up Your Python Development Environment - visual selection.png
   :alt: Setting Up Python Development Environment
   :width: 600

Installation & IDEs (Jupyter, VS Code)
--------------------------------------

- Download Python from the official website (python.org)
- Install using the installer for your OS
- Set up an IDE like Jupyter Notebook or Visual Studio Code for development
- Verify installation using `python --version` in the terminal
- Explore extensions and plugins for enhanced productivity
